comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Leland Ossian Howard (1857-1950) was Chief of the Bureau of Entomology, US Department of Agriculture, 1894-1927. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leland_Ossian_Howard His papers are at the American Philosophical Society: www.amphilsoc.org/mole/view?docId=ead/Mss.B.H835-ead.xml;...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca, for filling in the name of the famous entomologist.  We'll add the information the next time we update the record.
